page.title: 16LIFE STYLES IN CHINGFORD
page.content: Most people cook food for their meals at home.Sometimes people eat in restaurants or snack bars.Pizza,beefburgers,fish and chips are popular and these may be bought and taken away to eat. People may eat snacks between meals. Here are some of the snacks available at Larkswood Pool. {Big Feast }27p Beefburgers {85p {B.A. }20p Cornish pasty{50p {Sparkles }10p Sausage rolls{40p {Starships }15p Fizzy drinks {25p {Choc ice }25p Tea/Bovril {15p {Cornetto }35p Coffee {20p {Calypso }20p Sandwichs {50p {Tub }30p Chocolate { 20p { { { *********
